data.title: Beachfront Bed & Breakfast Niantic CT
data.meta_description: Plan your next escape by the sea. Explore Niantic village, boat Atlantic waters or enjoy the view from our quaint bed & breakfast in CT. Learn more!
data.text:
Amenities That Enchant

A Classic Boutique Inn Experience with Countless Charming Touches

The Inn at Harbor Hill Marina is a waterfront property overlooking the beautiful Long Island Sound. Our award-winning B&B is open year round and features 16 uniquely decorated (and newly remodeled!) suites. Choose a room and cozy up for a long weekend — enjoy first-class amenities including king or queen-sized beds, private baths, large soaking tubs, fireplaces and private balconies. All of this coupled with complimentary homemade breakfast each morning, free WiFi and the ever-charming New England atmosphere, you may just be persuaded to turn that weekend trip into a week-long getaway.

Guests of the Inn can now purchase a private pontoon cruise. This is great for celebrating anniversaries, birthdays and other special occasions! Enjoy a private boating quest along the scenic Niantic River and enjoy an exclusive experience paired with a delicious offering of food and beverage. The boating excursion includes your choice of red or white wine (non-alcohol beverages also available) along with sandwiches, fruit and other snack items. Please contact the Inn directly if you are interested in learning more about private pontoon cruise offerings! (860) 739-0331.

Gift certificates available!

Video Transcript

Embrace Your Surroundings

Feel Right at Home Near the Confluence of Land, Sea and Air

Wake up to a unique waterfront setting and get inspired to explore the quaint seaside village of Niantic that’s within walking distance of our inn! Leave your footprints in the sand on several town beaches and take a romantic stroll down the mile-long Niantic Bay Boardwalk overlooking the Long Island Sound. You’re sure to find excitement and relaxation that will create memories for years to come.
